TopicTitle: Loading Craft / Return to VAB causes craft to clip under map.

Articles.Content:
https://ibb.co/K20YbGZ

As stated in title, loading a craft or reverting to VAB after a flight causes craft to the clip under map, clicking on root part of vehicle doesnt allow to drag the whole craft back into usual build zone.

Reloading save or opening new then loading save doesnt sort the issue. craft save file becomes corrupted and none useable as always loads under floor.

V.0.1.1.0
